result.title: Help me solve this problem please.
result.content:
By anhcong395, contest: Codeforces Round #266 (Div. 2), problem: (C) Number of Ways, Runtime error on test 1, # ****

include <stdio.h>

include <conio.h>

define max 100002

long long x,result; int n; int a[max],l[max],r[max]; long long sum1[max],sum2[max]; void input() { int register i; scanf("%d",&n); for (i = 1; i <= n ; i++) scanf("%d",&a[i]); }

void prepare() { register int i; sum1[i-1] = 0; for (i = 1; i <=n ; i++) sum1[i] = sum1[i-1] + a[i]; sum2[n+1] = 0; for (i = n; i>=1; i--) sum2[i] = sum2[i+1] + a[i] ; } void count() { long long s; register int i; l[0] = 0; r[n+1] = 0; s = 0; for (i = 1; i <=n ; i++) s += a[i]; x = s / 3; if (x * 3 != s) { result = 0;

}
else
{
    prepare();
    for (i = 1; i <= n - 2; i ++)
    {
        l[i] = l[i-1];
        if (sum1[i] == x) 
            l[i]++;
    } 
    for (i = n; i >= 3 ; i--)
    {
        r[i] = r[i+1];
        if (sum2[i] == x) 
            r[i]++;
    }
}

} void solve() { int register i; long long d; d = 0; count(); for (i = 1; i <= n-2; i++) if (sum1[i] == x) d += r[i+2]; result = d; }

void output() { printf("%d",result); } int main() { input(); solve(); output(); } â†’Judgement Protocol Test: #1, time: 0 ms., memory: 2740 KB, exit code: 1, checker exit code: 0, verdict: RUNTIME_ERROR Input 5 1 2 3 0 3 Output 2 Checker Log
